Lore: \b Leader.\b0
Gametext: Adds 3 to power of anything he pilots. You may initiate battles here for free. Once per turn, may cancel game text of opponent's character of ability < 4 at same site until end of turn. Immune to Clash Of Sabers, Sorry About The Mess, and attrition < 6.

Lore: Stormtrooper.
Gametext: During battle with a stormtrooper, may cancel one opponent's just drawn automated or lightsaber weapon destiny. Permanent weapon is Z6 Riot Control Baton (may target a character for free; draw destiny; target hit if destiny > defense value).
Information: This card has an Episode VII icon.\par \par Original card: We Have A Prisoner
IsPulled: General Hux

Gametext: Adds 2 to power of anything he pilots. \ul When drawn for destiny, use 1 Force or this card is lost\ul0 . During your deploy phase, may use 3 Force to relocate Kylo from here to same site as a Resistance character,
Information: This card has an Episode VII icon.\par \par Original card: Lieutenant Tanbris

Lore: Trade Federation.
Gametext: Permanent weapon is [*)Maul's Lightsaber (may add 1 to Force drain where present; adds 1 to your battle destiny draws here; may target a character for free; draw two destiny; target hit, and its forfeit = 0, if total destiny > defense value).
Information: Original card: Maul's Lightsaber\par -----\par Darth Maul personas are:\par \par Darth Maul\par Darth Maul With Lightsaber\par Darth Maul, Lone Hunter\par Darth Maul, Young Apprentice\par Lord Maul\par Lord Maul With Lightsaber\par -----\par Maul's lightsaber 'personas' are:\par \par Maul's Double-Bladed Lightsaber\par Maul's Lightsaber\par Darth Maul With Lightsaber\par Lord Maul With Lightsaber

Permanent weapon is [*)Maul's Lightsaber (may target a character for free; draw two destiny; target hit, and its forfeit = 0, if total destiny > defense value).

Lore: \b Leader.\b0 Trade Federation.
Gametext: Once per game, may take into hand from Reserve Deck (reshuffle) Always Two There Are or a Neimoidian. If alone (or a [Theed Palace] objective on table) and opponent just initiated battle here, may exclude one character of ability < 6 present. Immune to attrition.
Information: Original card: Coruscant: Galactic Senate (Dark)\par \par Original concept by Bill Kafer.\par -----\par Sidious personas are:\par \par Darth Sidious\par Lord Sidious
Pulls: Always Two There Are\par Captain Daultay Dofine\par Daultay Dofine\par Lott Dod\par Neimoidian Pilot\par Nute Gunray\par Nute Gunray, Neimoidian Viceroy\par Rune Haako\par Rune Haako, Legal Counsel\par Sil Unch\par Tey How
IsPulled: Sith Fury (V)
Rules: (AR 1.7.1, D-4)\par Personas - Palpatine, Sidious, And The Emperor \par While in the saga of Star Wars we learn that the Emperor, Senator Palpatine, and Darth Sidious are one in the same, for game purposes they are treated as three distinct people. They will be referred to as Emperor, Palpatine, and Sidious, respectively.

Lore: Fiercely devoted Royal Guard. Feels deeply indebted to those who risk their life for him. Unaware of the extent of Palpatine's attrocities and cruelty.
Gametext: When deployed, may take into hand from Reserve Deck (reshuffle) a Royal Guard. If in battle with an Imperial, once per game may cancel a non-[Immune To Sense] interrupt.
Information: Royal Guards are:\par Kir Kanos\par Kir Kanos (V)\par Myn Kyneugh\par Myn Kyneugh (V)\par Royal Guard
Pulls: Kir Kanos\par Kir Kanos (V)\par Myn Kyneugh\par Myn Kyneugh (V)\par Royal Guard
IsPulled: Blizzard 4\par Kir Kanos (V)

Lore: Royal Guard \b leader\b0 . Remembers nothing of his past other than serving his Emperor. Early instructor of Kir Kanos and Carnor Jax.
Gametext: When deployed, may play a Defensive Shield from under your Starting Effect (as if from hand). While at opponent's battleground, Force drains here may not be reduced. Once per game, may use 1 Force to play opponent's just-played Interrupt out of play.
Information: Royal Guards are:\par Kir Kanos\par Kir Kanos (V)\par Myn Kyneugh\par Myn Kyneugh (V)\par Royal Guard
IsPulled: Blizzard 4\par Kir Kanos (V)

Lore: For important Imperial dignitaries, an individual Star Destroyer is placed at their personal disposal.
Gametext: Deploy on table. During your deploy phase, you may reveal one Star Destroyer from hand to take into hand from Reserve Deck (reshuffle) its matching pilot character (or vice versa) and deploy both simultaneously (for -1 Force each). (Immune to Alter.)
Information: Matching Star Destroyer/pilot pairs:\par \par Avenger: Captain Needa, Commander Nemet (V)\par Chimaera: Captain Gilad Pellaeon, Grand Admiral Thrawn, Grand Admiral Thrawn (V)\par Devastator: Commander Praji\par Executor: Admiral Piett, Captain Piett, Lord Vader\par Finalizer: Captain Peavey, General Hux\par Flagship Executor: Admiral Piett, Captain Piett, Lord Vader\par Tyrant: Captain Lennox, Lieutenant Cabbel
IsPulled: Twi'lek Advisor\par We Must Accelerate Our Plans

Lore: The Trade Federation utilizes such efficient methods of droid deployment that it is rumored even they do not know exactly how many battle droids are in circulation.
Gametext: Use 4 Force to deploy on table. While present with a Jedi, destroyer droids are defense value +2. If your destroyer droid was just lost, may stack it here. During your control phase, may use 2 Force to place any destroyer droid here in Used Pile. (Immune to Alter.)
Information: Original concept by Brian Hunter.\par \par Destroyer droids are:\par Destroyer Droid\par Droideka\par P-59\par P-60
IsPulled: Twi'lek Advisor\par We Must Accelerate Our Plans

Lore: "You don't know how hard I found it signing the order to terminate your life."
Gametext: Deploy on an Imperial leader (may immediately take any one card into hand from Force Pile; reshuffle). Leia may not cancel Force drains where you have an Imperial. If on Tarkin, once per turn may peek at top card of any Reserve Deck.
IsPulled: Sonic Bombardment (V)\par Twi'lek Advisor\par We Must Accelerate Our Plans
Information: Original concept by Dan Tartaglione.

Lore: When two Jedi are attempting to breach your bridge, even a destroyer droid's response time seems far too slow.
Gametext: Deploy on table. Non-unique destroyer droids are deploy -1 and forfeit +1. While all your characters at sites are destroyer droids and Neimoidians, opponent's characters are defense value -1 (to a minimum of 3) for each destroyer droid present. (Immune to Alter.)
IsPulled: Twi'lek Advisor\par We Must Accelerate Our Plans
Information: Original concept by Alden Peterson.

CardName: I Will Finish What You Started
Gametext: Deploy on table. Vader is lost. Once per turn, may stack an Interrupt from hand face up here to cancel a just drawn weapon destiny at Kylo's site. Kylo is power +1 for each card here. Once per game, may deploy from Reserve Deck (reshuffle) a lightsaber. (Immune to Alter.)

CardName: You Know What I've Come For

CardName: I Want That Map/And Now You'll Give It To Me
ObjectiveFront: \ul Deploy Tuanul Village, any other [Episode VII] location, and I Will Finish What You Started. Opponent may reveal a unique (*) Resistance character from Reserve Deck; that card is a Resistance Agent. Otherwise, Luke is a Resistance Agent and loses immunity to attrition.\ul0 \par \b For\b0  remainder of game, non-[Episode VII] Dark Jedi are lost and Resistance Agents are immune to Set For Stun. \par \b Flip\b0  this card if your First Order characters control two battlegrounds and a Resistance Agent is not present at a battleground site.
ObjectiveBack: \b While\b0  this side up, where you have a First Order leader, opponent must first use or lose 1 Force to draw a card for battle destiny. Unless BB-8 on table, opponent's Force retrieval is canceled. If Kylo on table: During your turn, may stack an Interrupt from your Lost Pile face up on I Will Finish What You Started; and once per turn, may play an Interrupt stacked there as if from hand (then place that card out of play).\par \b Flip\b0  this card if you do not occupy two battlegrounds or if a Resistance Agent is present at a battleground site.

Lore: Veteran of Battle of Hoth. Medic and \b scout\b0  assigned to General Solo's assault force. Prides himself on being an efficient soldier in General Madine's commando organization.

CardName: R'kik D'nec, Hero Of The Dune Sea (V)

Lore: First perfected by Corellian starship battle tacticians, this dangerous counter-maneuver has saved numerous hot-shot pilots in life-or-death situations.
Gametext: During battle, target opponent's starfighter with your snub fighter. Starfighter's gametext (except related to any capacity and the ability and identity of any permanent pilots) is canceled. OR If your pilot of ability < 3 was just lost from aboard a snub fighter, take pilot into hand.

Lore: Most space-faring adventurers meet their fate with a calm, quiet dignity.
Gametext: Cancel the game text of Jodo or any Fett for remainder of turn. OR Take into hand from Reserve Deck (reshuffle) Sabine, Under Attack, or a blaster. OR During a battle, if opponent just drew more than two battle destiny, cancel one of those destiny draws (your choice).
Pulls: Sabine Wren\par Under Attack\par Amidala's Blaster\par BlasTech E-11B Blaster Rifle\par Blaster\par Blaster Rifle\par Blaster Rifle (V)\par Cloud City Blaster\par Echo Base Trooper Rifle\par Han's Heavy Blaster Pistol\par Han's Heavy Blaster Pistol (V)\par Lando's Blaster Rifle\par Leia's Blaster Rifle\par Leia's Sporting Blaster\par Luke's Blaster Pistol\par Luke's Blaster Pistol (V)\par Mos Eisley Blaster\par Naboo Blaster Rifle\par Naboo Security Office Blaster\par Panaka's Blaster\par Stun Blaster

Lore: Echo Base heavy weapons units provided covering fire, allowing Alliance personnel to escape Hoth.
Gametext: \ul Once per turn, if drawn for destiny, you may activate 1 Force.\ul0  During battle at a site, choose: Your total power is +1 for each of your characters present. OR If you have a weapon present, opponent must use or lose 1 Force to draw their first battle destiny.
Information: Original concept by Ziemowit Skwara

Lore: "Echo station, 3TA. We have spotted Imperial walkers." A Rebel tactic is to put as much ground as possible between walkers and Rebel troops, allowing time to prepare a defense.
Gametext: Cancel Too Cold For Speeders. OR Unless opponent's AT-AT or AT-ST at a battleground site, retrieve 1 Force for each Rebel Base location you control (limit 3). OR Your Rebels and T-47s at sites where opponent has an AT-AT or AT-ST are power +2 for remainder of turn.
Information: Original concept by Jonathan Murray
IsPulled: Commander Luke Skywalker (V)
Cancels: Sunsdown & Too Cold For Speeders\par Too Cold For Speeders

CardName: I've Got A Bad Feeling About...
Lore: Unlike the Empire, the Alliance treats their droids with respect. Many droids volunteered to share the risk of battle and aid the Rebellion's assault on the Death Star.
Gametext: Take into hand from Reserve Deck (reshuffle) one security droid. OR During your control phase, if K-2SO controls opponent's site, opponent loses 1 Force. OR If a battle was just iniated where K-2SO is with your spy, lose K-2SO to cancel that battle. OR Cancel Nevar Yalnal.
Information: Original card: Fathful Service\par \par Original concept by Jeremy Gardner
IsPulled: Artoo & Threepio

Gametext: If Yavin 4 on table, deploy on table. If you just initiated a Force drain at a battleground system (except a 'liberated' system), may draw destiny. Add 1 for each piloted unique (*) snub fighter present at that system. If total destiny > 5, opponent loses 1 Force and stacks lost card face down there (while that card stacked there, system is 'liberated'). If opponent Force drains at a 'liberated' system, place stacked card in owner's Used Pile. At each 'liberated' system, your Force drains are +1 and opponent's starships are deploy +1.
Information: Original card: Coruscant Celebration

Gametext: While a Skywalker here, Prophecy Of The Force may not relocate from here.    No starships or vehicles here.
LightSideText: While a Skywalker here, Prophecy Of The Force may not relocate from here.
IsPulled: Mindful Of The Future\par The Shield Is Down! (V)\par Wuta

Gametext: Once per game, may deploy from Reserve Deck (reshuffle) a Rebel leader here.    Opponent's characters here are immune to Set For Stun.
LightSideText: Once per game, may deploy from Reserve Deck (reshuffle) a Rebel leader here.
DarkSideText: Opponent's characters here are immune to Set For Stun.

Lore: Phoenix Squadron.
Gametext: May add 2 pilots and 2 passengers. May deploy (with a pilot) or move as a 'react' to same system as a Rebel starship. When with \ul Ghost\ul0 , adds one destiny to total power.
Information: Original card: Gold 4
IsPulled: All Wings Report In & Darklighter Spin

Gametext: May add 1 pilot. While Ello Asty piloting, attrition against opponent is +1 here.
Icons: Astromech, Scomp Link, Resistance, Episode VII
Information: This card has a Resistance (starship) icon and an Episode VII icon.\par \par  Original card: Red 6
IsPulled: All Wings Report In & Darklighter Spin\par Red 1 (V)

CardName: He Is The Chosen One/He Will Bring Balance
ObjectiveFront: \ul Deploy Jedi Council Chamber (with Prophecy Of the Force there), Ewok Village, and I Feel The Conflict.\ul0 \par \b For\b0  remainder of game, you may not deploy [Episode I] Jedi (except Yoda) or [Episode I] padawans. Luke may not be captured by Bring Him Before Me unless there are 2 or more cards stacked on Insignigicant Rebellion during any move phase. \par \b While\b0  this side up, you may initiate battles for free. \par \b Flip\b0  this card if Luke (or a Jedi) at a battleground site and opponent has no characters or ability > 4 at battleground sites.
ObjectiveBack: \b While\b0  this side up, once during your control phase, may peek at up to X cards from the top of your Reserve Deck, where X = number of battlegrounds you occupy; take one into hand and shuffle your Reserve Deck. During your draw phase, may retrieve any one card; opponent may stack a card from hand on I Feel The Conflict to place that card out of play instead.\par \b Flip\b0  this card (unless Vader crossed over) if opponent's character of ability > 4 at a battleground site or you do not have Luke (or a Jedi) at a battleground site.
Gametext: [Front side] \ul Deploy Jedi Council Chamber (with Prophecy Of the Force there), Ewok Village, and I Feel The Conflict.\ul0 \par \b For\b0  remainder of game, you may not deploy [Episode I] Jedi (except Yoda) or [Episode I] padawans. Luke may not be captured by Bring Him Before Me unless there are 2 or more cards stacked on Insignigicant Rebellion during any move phase. \par [Back side] \b While\b0  this side up, you may initiate battles for free. \par \b Flip\b0  this card if Luke (or a Jedi) at a battleground site and opponent has no characters or ability > 4 at battleground sites.\par \b While\b0  this side up, once during your control phase, may peek at up to X cards from the top of your Reserve Deck, where X = number of battlegrounds you occupy; take one into hand and shuffle your Reserve Deck. During your draw phase, may retrieve any one card; opponent may stack a card from hand on I Feel The Conflict to place that card out of play instead.\par \b Flip\b0  this card (unless Vader crossed over) if opponent's character of ability > 4 at a battleground site or you do not have Luke (or a Jedi) at a battleground site.
Information: Original cards: A Vergeance In The Force/Your Insight Serves You Well

Lore: \b Leader.\b0
Gametext: Adds 3 to power of anything he pilots. Deploys -1 to \ul Finalizer\ul0 . While piloting \ul Finalizer\ul0 , it is immune to attrition < 8 (< 10 while with a Resistance character or [Resistance] starship). May be targeted by Imperial Command as an admiral (even if a unit of Force).
Information: This card has an Episode VII icon.\par \par Original card: Our First Catch Of The Day\par \par Errata shortly after release, originally titled Vice Admiral Resdox and missing last sentence.
IsPulled: Imperial Command

CardName: Yavin 4 Base Operations/The Time To Fight Is Now
ObjectiveFront: \ul Deploy Yavin 4 system and Massassi War Room. May deploy Restore Freedom To The Galaxy.\ul0 \par \b While\b0  this side up, once per turn, may use 1 Force to deploy from Reserve Deck (reshuffle) a battleground system. \par \b Flip\b0  this card if Rebels control two battleground systems (or if four Rebels are on table).
ObjectiveBack: \b While\b0  this side up, during battle at sites related to systems you occupy, for each piloted unique (*) snub fighter present at that system, your total power is +2. Once during your draw phase, if a system is 'liberated,' may place a card from your Lost Pile out of play to retrieve 1 Force.\par \b Flip\b0  this card if you do not occupy two battlegrounds (unless four Rebels are on table).
ObjectiveBackName: The Time To Fight Is Now
Gametext: [Front side] \ul Deploy Yavin 4 system and Massassi War Room. May deploy Restore Freedom To The Galaxy.\ul0 \par \b While\b0  this side up, once per turn, may use 1 Force to deploy from Reserve Deck (reshuffle) a battleground system. \par \b Flip\b0  this card if Rebels control two battleground systems (or if four Rebels are on table).\par [Back side] \b While\b0  this side up, during battle at sites related to systems you occupy, for each piloted unique (*) snub fighter present at that system, your total power is +2. Once during your draw phase, if a system is 'liberated,' may place a card from your Lost Pile out of play to retrieve 1 Force.\par \b Flip\b0  this card if you do not occupy two battlegrounds (unless four Rebels are on table).
Information: Original cards: Red 7/All Wings Report In (Rare)
